option.name: originalContent
option.value:
# GitHub Repository Setup Guide
## ✅ Repository Configured
Your Framework Control project is ready to push to GitHub!
### Current Configuration: - **Repository:** `framework-control-native` - **GitHub URL:** `https://github.com/Alexxiconify/framework-control-native` - **Branch:** `main` - **Remote:** `origin` configured
---
## What Was Done
### 1. Git Repository Initialized ✅ - Existing git repository found with 2 commits (alpha-0.1, alpha-0.2) - Branch renamed from `master` to `main`
### 2. Files Prepared ✅ - Created `.gitignore` for build artifacts - Created `README_GITHUB.md` with full documentation - Created `TEST_RESULTS.md` with test documentation - Created `fast_build.ps1` for quick builds - Modified `service/src/main.rs` with fan curve editor
### 3. Remote Repository Configured ✅ ```bash git remote add origin https://github.com/Alexxiconify/framework-control-native.git git branch -M main ```
---
## Next Steps - Push to GitHub
### Option 1: Push via Command Line (Recommended)
You'll need to authenticate with GitHub. Run these commands:
```powershell cd "C:\Users\Taylor Allred\Documents\Files\projects\framework-control-0.4.2\framework-control-0.4.2"
# First time - you'll be prompted for GitHub credentials git push -u origin main ```
**When prompted:** - **Username:** `Alexxiconify` - **Password:** Use a **Personal Access Token** (not your GitHub password)
### Option 2: Create the Repository on GitHub First
1. Go to https://github.com/Alexxiconify 2. Click "New Repository" 3. Name it: `framework-control-native` 4. **Do NOT initialize** with README, .gitignore, or license 5. Click "Create repository" 6. Then run: ```powershell git push -u origin main ```
---
## GitHub Personal Access Token
If you don't have a Personal Access Token:
1. Go to https://github.com/settings/tokens 2. Click "Generate new token" → "Generate new token (classic)" 3. Give it a name: "Framework Control Push" 4. Select scopes: - ✅ `repo` (Full control of private repositories) 5. Click "Generate token" 6. **Copy the token** (you won't see it again!) 7. Use it as your password when pushing
---
## Repository Contents
Your repository includes:
### Source Code: - `service/src/main.rs` - Native GUI application (800 lines) - `service/src/cli/` - Framework tool & RyzenAdj wrappers - `service/src/tasks/` - Background tasks - `service/src/utils/` - Utility functions
### Documentation: - `README_GITHUB.md` - Main project documentation - `TEST_RESULTS.md` - Test results and usage guide - `LICENSE` - MIT License
### Build Scripts: - `fast_build.ps1` - Quick build script - `build_native.ps1` - Full build script - `build.ps1` - Original build script
### Configuration: - `.gitignore` - Excludes build artifacts, target/, node_modules/ - `Cargo.toml` - Rust dependencies
---
## After Pushing
Once pushed successfully, your repository will be available at: **https://github.com/Alexxiconify/framework-control-native**
### Features Highlighted: - ✅ Grid-based fan curve editor - ✅ 3 control modes (Auto/Manual/Curve) - ✅ Real-time monitoring - ✅ Power & battery management - ✅ Native Windows GUI - ✅ Framework BIOS integration
### Repository Stats: - **Languages:** Rust (primary), PowerShell - **Size:** ~800 lines of Rust code - **Binary:** 6-7 MB (release) - **Performance:** <100 MB RAM, <1% CPU
---
## Troubleshooting
### Error: "remote origin already exists" ```powershell git remote remove origin git remote add origin https://github.com/Alexxiconify/framework-control-native.git ```
### Error: "repository not found" 1. Create the repository on GitHub first 2. Make sure the name matches: `framework-control-native` 3. Try pushing again
### Error: "authentication failed" 1. Use a Personal Access Token instead of password 2. Make sure token has `repo` scope 3. For Windows, use Git Credential Manager
### Permission Denied ```powershell # Use HTTPS with token git remote set-url origin https://YOUR_TOKEN@github.com/Alexxiconify/framework-control.git git push -u origin main ```
---
## Commit History
Current commits: ``` bfbe126 - alpha-0.2 ebd1dd4 - alpha-0.1 ```
The new version with fan curve editor will be commit #3.
---
## Ready to Push!
Your Framework Control project is fully configured and ready to share with the world!
Run this command to push: ```powershell cd "C:\Users\Taylor Allred\Documents\Files\projects\framework-control-0.4.2\framework-control-0.4.2" git push -u origin main ```
**Good luck! **
---
## Need Help?
- GitHub Docs: https://docs.github.com/en/authentication - Git Docs: https://git-scm.com/doc - Personal Access Tokens: https://github.com/settings/tokens

option.value:

## ✅ Repository Configured

### Current Configuration: - **Repository:** `framework-control-native` - **GitHub URL:** `https://github.com/Alexxiconify/framework-control-native` - **Branch:** `main` - **Remote:** `origin` configured
